featureOperations.helpText: Add two numbers, i.e., a + b
Subtract two numbers, i.e., a - b
Multiply two numbers, i.e., a * b
Divide two numbers, i.e., a / b
Calculate the exponential function, i.e., e^x
Add all inputs: sum_i x_i, i.e., x_0 + x_1 + ...
Multiply all inputs: prod_i x_i, i.e., x_0 * x_1 * ...
Sigmoid activation function, i.e., y=1/(1 + e^(-x))
Tanh activation function, i.e., y=(e^x - e^(-x))(e^x + e^(-x))
ReLU activation function, i.e., y=max(0, x)

Calculate the squared error, i.e., (y_t - y_e)^2
 (y_t: true value, y_e: estimated value)

Calculate the binary cross-entropy,
 i.e., y_t * log(y_e) + (1 - y_t) * log(1 - y_e)
 (y_t: true value, y_e: estimated value)
